name: Yousra Aafer
content: Yousra Aafer @ University of Waterloo Yousra Aafer Assistant Professor David R. Cheriton School of Computer ScienceUniversity of Waterloo About me Teaching Publications Professional Services I am an Assistant Professor in the Cheriton School of Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. My research interests span the areas of systems security and software engineering, specifically focusing on mobile and smart devices security . I am a member of the Cryptography, Security, and Privacy (CrySP) research group . Teaching Fall 2024: CS 858: Topics on Mobile and IoT Security. Publications ASE '24 A Longitudinal Analysis Of Replicas in the Wild Wild Android. S. M. A. Zaidi*, S. Khan*, P. Vyas, and Y. Aafer In Proceedings of the 39th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering, 2024.
